name: Saga Motor Hotel

reviews.text: I was curious when I saw this ranked close behind the Ritz, but it's a wonderfully cosy little motel. Room was immaculately clean and good-sized. Free high-speed Internet was great (they even provided an Ethernet cable to me free). Nice location in Pasadena. Staff was courteous. An incredible value. I will definitely return.
reviews.title: Perfect cosy motel
why so much these year
reviews.text: last year my family stayed at saga we love it it was great and hospitable but these year its a three day minimun why? we love staying there

reviews.title: Great Vintage Find!!
reviews.text: If you want turn-down service with a mint on your pillow don't stay here. However, if you are looking for that "retro" California feel, stay at The Saga!!

reviews.title: great place great location
reviews.text: The accomodations are basic, but, clean and inviting along with a very pleasant staff and great continental breakfast. We enjoyed our breakfast next to the pool.

description: Built in the 1950's, the historic Saga Motor Hotel is known as the timeless jewel of Pasadena California. The Saga Features spacious rooms with a country feel, lovely courtyard pool area Located on the world famous Tournament of Roses Parade route, the Saga a is a premier destination.
